title: Teenage boy’s body found in creek after Blue Mountains camping trip
summary_full: Boy’s friend, 17, winched to safety by emergency rescue team after pair were separated in Blue Gum forestFollow our Australia news live blog for latest updatesGet our breaking news email, free app or daily news podcastA teenage boy has been found dead in a national park creek in the Blue Mountains after he became separated from a friend on a camping trip.Two boys, aged 16 and 17, travelled to Leura train station on Tuesday before they walked to Mount Hay, New South Wales police said.
